answers.answer: Eww  I did that earlier today I felt miserable plus on top of that I had to get a rogam shot I've been in bed since I got hone bleh :/

I hated the drink! And I failed my 1 hour test so I had to take the 3 hour which you have to drink a larger amount. I failed that one too, barely. So I have gestational diabetes.  No fun. And I had no symptoms at all.
I failed my 1 hour test and my 3 hour test as well... I also didn't have any symptoms.. :((
I failed my 1 hour test and my 3 hour test as well... I also didn't have any symptoms.. :((
I'm so not excited for these results to come back. I already have sugar in my urine (tmi) and a few other symptoms.
With the firat pregnancy I failed my 1 hour but passes my 3 hour.  I hate drinking that awful drink! It's the worst test ever!
I wonder if every clinic is different as far as flavors and if it's served warm or chilled. The one I had tasted like cold Hawaiian Punch. It was good.

I have had all 3 flavors... lemon lime with my first- and they served it warm-- bleh... orange with the 1hr for this pregnancy and (since I failed the 1hr) fruit punch for the 3hr with this pregnancy (failed that one too)... the orange (for me) was the best tasting... oh- and this pregnancy served cold

question: I just drank that amazing glucola drink
title: glucose tolerance test
